channel.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
channel.description:
Just curious and wanted to see when alot of the people started..
I started in 1.1_02 I think there are a bunch of people who started before me in like 1.1 or 1.0 :O

item.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:432333”]Lin made the idea topic, I had no idea what Minecraft was but I offered my services as a hoster It was also my first experience with the game.
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,471687.0.html

Based on http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history/Beta and the date of that topic, I started hosting December 29th, which was 1.1_02[/quote]
Oh so I have been playing the server since the first version it was released :3

Read full topic

item.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Oh wow, I remember the spiders can climb walls update so well. I remember redoing my wall completely because I thought a million spiders were just going to turn up, climb over and murder me.

Read full topic
item.source: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?

item.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Lin made the idea topic, I had no idea what Minecraft was but I offered my services as a hoster It was also my first experience with the game.
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,471687.0.html

Based on http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Version_history/Beta and the date of that topic, I started hosting December 29th, which was 1.1_02

Read full topic

item.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I think it was David then I think Rix_ posted I HAVE A VPS (OBVIOUSLY FREE TOO)

then from there on it flowed and the server was made

but before that there were a bunch of minecraft topics and surprisingly MITB agreed :o

Read full topic
item.source: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?

item.title: Since what version have YOU been playing moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Lord knows…

I was actually the first person to post on the thread Davidi2 originally made asking about the server, when he was asking for hosters - I removed it when someone else offered because my offer compared to theres was petty

This was obviously way before Moparcraft.net or even a board on Moparscape, just a topic with no posts and no server yet.

EDIT: Just remembered, was it Lin or David that made the idea topic? I’m pretty sure it was Lin that wanted a hoster.

Read full topic
